Workouts

Workouts and routines

Routines

Code 
import pandas as pd

workouts = "../static/resources/workouts.xlsx"
w1 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=0)
w2 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=1)
w3 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=2)
w4 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=3)
schedule = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=4)

The following regimen outlines a 4 week lift cycle. The routine is a slightly modified version of this. Non-lift days should be supplemented with active recovery workouts.

Schedule

Code 
schedule.to_html(index=False, render_links=True)
Week Sunday Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday
1 Cardio Chest & Triceps, Run Back & Biceps Shoulders & Traps, Run Legs Chest & Triceps, Run Cardio
2 Cardio Shoulders & Traps, Run Chest & Triceps Back & Biceps, Run Legs Shoulders & Traps, Run Cardio
3 Cardio Back & Biceps, Run Shoulders & Traps Chest & Triceps, Run Legs Back & Biceps, Run Cardio
4 Cardio Chest & Triceps, Run Legs Shoulders & Traps, Run Legs Back & Biceps, Run Cardio

Back & Biceps

Code 
w1.to_html(index=False)
Lift Sets Reps
Deadlift 4 10, 8, 5, 3
Pull-Ups 4 10
Lat Pull Downs 4 10
Rows 4 12
Face Pulls 4 12
Dumbbell Rows 4 12
Hammer Curls 3 12
Barbell Curls 3 12
Back Hyperextension 4 12
Planks 3 60 seconds
Leg Raises 3 15
Sit Ups 3 25

Chest & Triceps

Code 
w2.to_html(index=False)
Lift Sets Reps
Bench Press 4 10, 8, 5, 3
Incline Press 4 12
Flys 4 12
Dips 3 Failure
Tricep Pushdowns 4 12
Dumbbell Press 4 12
Ab Roller 3 10
Sitting Twists 3 30
Wipers 3 12

Legs

Code 
w3.to_html(index=False)
Lift Sets Reps
Back Squat 4 10, 8, 5, 3
Front Squat 4 6
Lunges 3 12
Kettelbell Deadlift 3 12
Leg Kickbacks 3 12
Back Hyperextension 4 12
Calf Raises 4 12
Glute Bridges 3 10

Shoulders & Traps

Code 
w4.to_html(index=False)
Lift Sets Reps
Military Press 4 12, 8, 5, 3
Lateral Raises 4 12
Rear Delt Flys 4 12
Front Raises 3 10
Barbell Shrugs 4 10
One Arm Dumbbell Snatch 3 10
Upright Rows 3 10
Kettlebell Swing 3 10
Farmers Carry 3 Failure
Scissor Kicks 3 30 seconds
L-sit 3 Failure
Toe Taps 3 20

Introductory Routines

Code 
w5 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=5)
w6 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=6)
w7 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=7)

Push Intro

Code 
w5.to_html(index=False, render_links=True)

Leg Raises 3 10 View
